title: Design of Rockets and Space Launch Vehicles

yaml.title: Design of Rockets and Space Launch Vehicles
yaml.subtitle: Lecture slides for AERO3261, AERO5260, AERO5200, AMME5510
yaml.author: Dr. Lorenzo Campoli

markdown.markdown:
These are the lecture slides for the **"Design of Rockets and Space Launch
Vehicles"** course from The University of Sydney. They can be used to see and
follow which topics are covered in the course. The slides are not intended to
be used to learn the design of rockets and space launch vehicles from scratch.
For that, you need to attend the lectures and complete the assignments and
assessment sessions.

# Lecture Materials

-   [Lecture 0: Course Overview](/Lecture0/lecture0.html) ([slides](/Lecture0/lecture0.pdf))

-   [Lecture 1: Introduction to Launch Vehicles (LVs)](/Lecture1/lecture1.html) ([slides](/Lecture1/lecture1.pdf))

-   [Lecture 2: History of rocketry & LVs](/Lecture2/lecture2.html) ([slides](/Lecture2/lecture2.pdf))

-   [Lecture 3: Mission requirements](/Lecture3/lecture3.html) ([slides](/Lecture3/lecture3.pdf))

-   [Lecture 4: Propulsion](/Lecture4/lecture4.html) ([slides](/Lecture4/lecture4.pdf))

-   [Lecture 5: Performance estimation](/Lecture5/lecture5.html) ([slides](/Lecture5/lecture5.pdf))

-   [Lecture 6: LV trajectory optimization](/Lecture6/lecture6.html) ([slides](/Lecture6/lecture6.pdf))

-   [Lecture 7: LV structures](/Lecture7/lecture7.html) ([slides](/Lecture7/lecture7.pdf))

-   [Lecture 8: LV ground, transportation & ascent loads](/Lecture8/lecture8.html) ([slides](/Lecture8/lecture8.pdf))

-   [Lecture 9: Launch environment](/Lecture9/lecture9.html) ([slides](/Lecture9/lecture9.pdf))

-   [Lecture 10: Stability & Instabilities](/Lecture10/lecture10.html) ([slides](/Lecture10/lecture10.pdf))

-   [Lecture 11: LV Manufacturing](/Lecture11/lecture11.html) ([slides](/Lecture11/lecture11.pdf))

-   [Lecture 12: LV systems](/Lecture12/lecture12.html) ([slides](/Lecture12/lecture12.pdf))

-   [Lecture 13: Testing](/Lecture13/lecture13.html) ([slides](/Lecture13/lecture13.pdf))

-   [Lecture 14: Failures](/Lecture14/lecture14.html) ([slides](/Lecture14/lecture14.pdf))

-   [Lecture 15: LV Financial analysis](/Lecture15/lecture15.html) ([slides](/Lecture15/lecture15.pdf))

# Readings

A significant amount of resources has been utilized to compile the lecture notes, which serve as the primary reference for this course.
All cited books, papers, reports, and theses can be accessed through electronic databases or found at The University of Sydney Library.
Below, you will find the recommended readings for each topic and week.
Additional references are available in the bibliography for further exploration.

| Week | Readings                                                                                                                                                                        |
|:----:|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|  1   | @edberg2022design: Chapter 1                                                                                                                                                    |
|  2   | @edberg2022design: Chapter 2                                                                                                                                                    |
|  3   | @edberg2022design: Chapter 3                                                                                                                                                    |
|  4   | @edberg2022design: Chapter 4, @humble1995space: Chapter 6, @hill1992mechanics: Chapter 10, 11, 12, @sutton2011rocket: Chapter 12, 13, 14, 15, @zucrow1948principles: Chapter 12 |
|  5   | @edberg2022design: Chapter 5                                                                                                                                                    |
|  6   | @edberg2022design: Chapter 6                                                                                                                                                    |
|  7   | @edberg2022design: Chapter 7                                                                                                                                                    |
|  8   | @edberg2022design: Chapter 8                                                                                                                                                    |
|  9   | @edberg2022design: Chapter 9                                                                                                                                                    |
|  10  | @edberg2022design: Chapter 10                                                                                                                                                   |
|  11  | @edberg2022design: Chapter 11                                                                                                                                                   |
|  12  | @edberg2022design: Chapter 12                                                                                                                                                   |
|  13  | @edberg2022design: Chapter 13                                                                                                                                                   |
|  14  | @edberg2022design: Chapter 14                                                                                                                                                   |
|  15  | @edberg2022design: Chapter 15                                                                                                                                                   |

: {tbl-colwidths="\[6,94\]"}

# Contributors

-   Lorenzo Campoli

# Copyright

Lorenzo Campoli
